structure.unit: ARTICLE IV. HOMESTEAD COMMUNITY REDEVELOPMENT AND REVITALIZATION TRUST FUND

law.catch_line: Review of financial records; right of audit.

text.section:
Sec. 30A-104. Review of financial records; right of audit.
The financial records for the redevelopment trust fund shall be prepared pursuant to Section 163.387(8), Florida Statutes, as amended and shall be available for County inspection. The County reserves the right of audit of the fund.
